extendedInfo.description: *** The most addictive drawing game ever ****** Draw the dots. Develop your imagination ***Many people genuinely love draw-the-dots puzzles and this app taps into that appetite by presenting a series of puzzles that each consist of the challenge of connecting numbers and letters in sequence. When you succeed in connecting all of the dots, the outline is delightfully transformed into a beautiful graphic. It might be a animal, a ride or a fruit. And you are surprised and filled with wonder to see the creatures and objects they have created "come to life".Choosing the play button immediately begins a draw-the-dot game. With a friendly interface, the app is simple enough for you to play without any help. You can connect the dots by either finger-drag drawing or single tapping from dot-to-dot. As he or she progresses, the next dot lights up.The images that appear when you completes a picture are not always easy to guess. This lends an element of mystery to the activity, developing your imagination and love of learning.Tags : One touch Drawing, Dot drawing, Brain Training, Puzzle, Sudoku, dot draw, dot connect, kids, pictures, draw something, paint, brush, color, icon, Doodle, Drawing Pad, Sketch, Fun, Photo, Sketchbook, Paint Joy, Touch, Finger paint, Coloring, PaintBrush, Painter, Free Sketch, Photo, Fun, Photography, Sketch Pad, Photo Editing, Neon, Glow, Easy, Masterpiece, Painting, Kids Drawing,skyrim,Weather

reviews.title: Retarded
reviews.comment: Unless you have a phone or tablet stylus this game is IMPOSIBLE! I have tiny thumbs and it still covers the dot things when im trying to draw this app is RETARDED and eitherway it makes the most annoying noise when you touch a dot. I didnt even want to give this app a star. :l

reviews.title: This game is...

reviews.title: Tooo close
reviews.comment: UPDATED: (STILL THE SAME) The dots are too close and you can\'t see what you are doing.  The pictures look nothing like what I drew.  This game is soo boring I\'d rather read a book. ALSO there is this thing that kept popping up.. couldn\'t see anything... grrr unistalled!!!
